title: Magic Hand Bag
desc:
*It's not DLC, it's a Surprise Mechanic!*

This item lets you reroll the gold and item obtained from the most recently defeated monster, as long as they remain in your inventory.

If it's a monster that has multiple possible item drops, the rerolled item will always be different than what was initially dropped.

You cannot reroll the same loot twice. You cannot reroll the 🗺️ Dungeon Map obtained on Floor 100.
